about.title: RAD: Your trusted partner to build Africa
about.intro: African Development Network is a multi-sector company that has been supporting the economic and industrial transformation of the African continent since 2018.
about.description: Founded in 2018, RAD is a multi-sector company supporting the economic and industrial development of Africa. Our expertise covers trade, construction, transportation, IT and training, with a constant commitment to operational excellence and sustainable impact.

1.title: Proven multi-sector expertise
1.description: Trade, construction, transport, IT and training: an integrated offering covering the entire value chain.

2.title: Leading local and international partners
2.description: Strategic collaborations with Caterpillar, Rio Tinto, and major players in the African industry.

3.title: Turnkey solutions and measurable impact
3.description: From design to delivery, we guarantee operational excellence and tangible results.

mission.content: Provide concrete and sustainable solutions for the economic and industrial development of Africa.

values.content: Integrity, excellence, respect for communities, innovation and long-term commitment.

hero.title: Our concrete projects in the field
hero.subtitle: RAD operates on industrial, mining, logistics, commercial and real estate projects. Each project is designed to meet real needs, with a pragmatic and impact-oriented approach.

projects.title: Ongoing Contracts
projects.subtitle: Large-scale projects illustrating our multi-sector expertise and commitment to operational excellence.

1.title: Multi-year Industrial Equipment Supply Contract
1.description: Comprehensive supply contract covering professional welding equipment, Toyota automotive parts and filters for heavy machinery. Import, storage, local logistics and continuous delivery ensuring permanent availability and operational continuity.
impacts: Multi-category inventory management (welding, Toyota parts, filters)
Planned and urgent delivery according to client needs
Optimization of international shipping times
Order tracking and traceability system
Reduction of machine downtime due to consumables shortage

2.title: Continuous IT Consumables Supply
2.description: Three-year contract for regular supply of IT consumables for administrative and technical services. Stock management, international procurement, local distribution and logistics assistance ensuring constant availability.
impacts: Continuous supply of various consumables
Proactive stock management to avoid shortages
Planned delivery according to client operational cycles
Basic technical support on supplied equipment
Reduced waiting times through optimized logistics

3.title: Caterpillar & Donaldson Parts and Equipment Supply
3.description: Ongoing supply of spare parts and Caterpillar and Donaldson equipment for major industrial partners. Continuous procurement ensuring permanent availability of critical parts for mining and construction operations.
impacts: Multi-client supply (GPC, Moto-Engil, AngloGold Ashanti)
Strategic stock management of critical parts
Reduced downtime through permanent availability
Direct partnership with Caterpillar and Donaldson
Optimized logistics for urgent deliveries

4.title: Road Maintenance ‚Äì Bituminous Binder Application
4.description: Maintenance work on paved roads consisting of applying bituminous binder (emulsion) to the asphalt surface to strengthen adhesion, protect the pavement and extend its lifespan. Operation includes road cleaning, binder spraying and finishing according to technical maintenance standards.
impacts: Cleaning and preparation of road surface
Bituminous binder (emulsion) spraying
Strengthening adhesion and pavement protection
Extended road lifespan
Finishing according to road maintenance technical standards

hero.title: Building Africa's tomorrow, together
hero.subtitle: Since 2018, RAD has been supporting the industrial and economic development of the African continent with expertise, integrity and commitment.

story.title: Our story
story.content:
Founded in 2018, African Development Network (RAD) was born from the vision of creating a local player capable of meeting the growing needs of the mining industry and infrastructure development in West Africa.

Since our beginnings, we have evolved from a mining services company to a multi-sector group covering construction, logistics, international trade, training and technical services.

Today, RAD is recognized as a trusted partner by the largest companies operating on the continent, thanks to our technical expertise, international network and commitment to excellence.
